alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:31PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Sedgwick and northwestern Sumner Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 631 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clearwater, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Clearwater, Conway Springs, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, East Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport, Northeast Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Oaklawn, Riverdale and Wellington Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 19. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 27 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
